name: LLM Error Rate SLO (< 1%)
description: Ensures less than 1% of LLM requests result in errors over a 7-day rolling window.
rationale: A 1% error rate threshold ensures users rarely experience failures. LLM APIs can fail due to quota exhaustion, rate limiting, or transient errors. This SLO catches systemic issues before impacting user trust.
